content.text:
[@Culexus](@fiBgVbuck/HA1/yGQgb8LvWs9pQF1hgZ/zaxkhpQXBY=.ed25519) 

Hey, any chance you have Scuttlebutt running in the background? Alternatively, if you were trying to connect to a pub then that message means that the pub is down. Happy to help if you're still having issues!

Unrelated, but #somebodyshould disambiguate these error messages.
